participant_1.name: Emily Thompson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and passionate about nature, enjoys spending quality time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: I'm secretly worried that my grocery store won't be successful. I'm going to spend time with my family and friends. I live in a suburb of Boston. I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion. I love to go to the lake.

participant_2.name: Michael Johnson
participant_2.personality: Sensitive and outgoing, often seeks approval from loved ones but enjoys simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: I'm trying to get my mother to love me. I get sad a lot. I caught a huge fish on my last fishing trip! I like to get Chick-fil-A on my way to work. I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
I'm doing well, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing well! What's going on in your life?
I just got back from a fishing trip and caught a huge fish!
That's awesome! I love fishing. Where did you go fishing?
I went to the lake near my house.
That's great! I love fishing in lakes. I used to live in a town near a lake and I would go fishing all the time.
That's awesome! I wish I lived near a lake.
Me too! It was so much fun. I would spend hours fishing every weekend.
I bet that was great! I wish I could go fishing more often.
Well, you can come with me sometime!
That would be great! I would love to go fishing with you!
Awesome! We can make a plan soon.
